entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as jumping forward and trying to save Ron, but ultimately escaping from the Obliviate spell.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is described as straightening up, panting, and having a gleaming smile on his face after casting the Obliviate spell.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as losing his mind at the sight of the girl's mangled body and being affected by the Obliviate spell.

relationships.description: Lockhart is described as having Ron's wand in his hand.
